About Me

Hello, I am a former CPhT of 12 years turned aspiring Web Developer. After years of working in healthcare I decided it was a time for a change so I looked into Vanderbilt's coding bootcamp.

Robot Gladiator

Built With: JavaScript,HTML

An text based robot battle game. The user names their robot then goes to battle in a series of three fights. The user has the option to drop out of the fight if they feel it is going poorly as well as being able to purchase a strength upgrade or heal in between matches.

View Project on GitHub
